com.ami.mse.ucms.dms

Interface JCRDocumentService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JCRDoccumentServiceImpl

    public interface JCRDocumentService
    The JCRDocumentService, which provides an interface for handling the documents, that are stored in the jackrabbit repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocuments

        List<DocumentInstance> getDocuments(String jcrSql,
                                  int limit,
                                  int offset)
        Gets the documents, given a specific jcr query, provides true paging through the limit and offset constants..
        Parameters:
        jcrSql - the jcr sql
        limit - the limit number of items to be fetched
        offset - the offset offset i.e. if we want the 3rd page, where each page has 4 items, we set offset to 3 and limit to 4
        Returns:
        list of documents
